title.rendered: 7 Therapeutic Yoga Poses to Improve Health

content.rendered:
7 Therapeutic Yoga Poses to Improve Health

IMPROVE YOUR HEALTH WITH

THERAPEUTIC YOGA

Therapeutic yoga is used to specifically target health conditions or concerns such as migraines, IBS, back pain, asthma, and more!

Learn More!

The side plank can be integrated into any therapeutic yoga routine for increasing strength and balance.

Learn More!

The side mountain pose is extremely helpful for those looking to increase lung capacity and practice the deep breathing

Learn More!

Hatha yoga poses such as the Tree Pose is great for easement of mental health issues such as depression

Learn More!

Another basic hatha yoga pose to try is the bridge pose.

Learn More!

Try poses like Warrior Pose I to increase your confidence.

Learn More!

Practicing “bee breath” can also help you alleviate stress and anxiety, no respiratory illnesses required.

Learn More!

The cobra pose can be used as a safe form of pain relief, even for minor pains.

Learn More!

Swipe up for details on Therapeutic Yoga 

Swipe Up!

excerpt.rendered: 7 Therapeutic Yoga Poses to Improve Health. What is Therapeutic Yoga, how does it differ from regular yoga, and how therapeutic yoga may be able to help alleviate your health concerns,.
